game.name: Fight Flight
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Fight Flight is a 3D Flight Simulator Game that takes you around the world flying a plane. You can either shoot enemy planes in real life places, or just fly around the world for fun!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Fight Flight is a 3D Flight Simulator Game that takes you around the world flying a plane. You can either shoot enemy planes in real life places, or just fly around the world for fun!
